name: Zodiac Fighters (Prototype)
description: It’s main influence is the Chinese Zodiac and the story of the race. You play as the Pig, who aspires to win the race and gain wisdom, courage and strength that the Rat holds. However this goes against the tradition of the Rat winning the race, which all the animals are strongly against.  You, as the Pig, need to battle the oncoming waves of animals that are out to stop you in your tracks in order to defeat the Rat and reach your goal. Controls: WASD or Arrow Keys XBOX: Left Analog to Move      Rotation: Right Analog and Mouse to Look around and use their guns. Shoot: Press Right Bumber or Left Click on the mouse.  Their are waves that you must overcome in order to fight the boss.
